name: Orb Room
description:
A little 3D puzzel-platformer game where your goal is to collect all orbs.

A game made for Ludum Dare 37 & Qazijam9. (Same weekend)

Controlls:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Interact: E key or Left Mouse Button

I will most likely not continue on this game unless there is some interest for it. Was mostly just made for the jams. :)
